short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making Themis bar prep a bit easier (Unofficial extension)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you set a default video playback speed and quality that will automatically be selected when viewing recorded lectures in the Themis Bar Review course. There is also an option to automatically start playing videos when the page loads and an option to automatically enable subtitles. The extension also adds "skip forward/backward" buttons to the video player.

If you think of something that would make this extension even better, feel free to contact me using the "Contact the developer" link below!

NOTE: This app is not produced or endorsed by Themis.
